name: vscode-tmux-ai
description: Production-grade VS Code integration for tmux-ai-cli (multi-session, multi-client, passive sync).

tmuxAi.discovery.searchPaths.description: Candidate paths to probe when tmuxAi.cliPath is not set.

tmuxAi.namingPattern.description: Auto naming pattern used by the extension when creating sessions.

tmuxAi.passiveSync.enabled.description: Refresh sessions silently when VS Code regains focus.

tmuxAi.terminal.nameFormat.description: Terminal name format for the primary client.

tmuxAi.terminal.multiClientNameFormat.description: Terminal name format for additional clients (k starts from 2).

tmuxAi.terminal.useProfileFallback.description: Allow writing workspace .vscode/settings.json as a fallback for terminal appearance.

tmuxAi.debug.description: Enable debug logs in the extension.
